testcase.classname: US1001 Kullanici Amazon Sayfasinda Arama Yapar
testcase.name: TC03 kullanici iphone aratir
testcase.system-out: When kullanici amazon anasayfasinda.........................................passed And kullanici iphone icin arama yapar.......................................passed Then sonuclarin iphone icerdigini test eder.................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: US1003 kullanici parametre kullanarak arama yapabilmeli
testcase.name: TC06 kullanici parametre ile amazonda arama yapabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasinda........................................passed And kullanici "Java" icin arama yapar.......................................passed And sonuclarin "Java" icerdigini test eder..................................passed Then sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC15 herokuapp'dan delete butonu calismali
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "herokuappUrl" anasayfasinda................................passed And add element butonuna basar..............................................passed Then Delete butonu gorunur oluncaya kadar bekler............................passed And Delete butonunun gorunur oldugunu test eder.............................passed Then Delete butonuna basar..................................................passed And Delete butonunun gorunmedigini test eder................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
